explanations.reason: The paper focuses on assessing portfolio vulnerability to systemic risk using vine copula and APARCH-DCC models, specifically evaluating the Conditional Value-at-Risk (CoVaR) measure. The study does not mention or utilize any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or large language models. The methodologies discussed are statistical and econometric in nature, focusing on risk assessment and portfolio analysis rather than machine learning approaches.
